channel.title: Home on Dora Designs and Signs
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Dora Designs and Signs

item.title: CNC Machining & Laser Cutting
item.description: We can machine or laser cut your design, artwork or product! We can also add engravings, markings or burning to an existing product. Add a permanent logo, artwork, lasered image, or special message for a life event. Phone cases, knives, Ipads, cutting boards, glasses, just to name a few. Some materials are better suited for certain cutting processes - if you are unsure of the best way, just ask us! Some materials, such as Vinyl, cannot be lasered due to harmful fumes released when burned.

item.title: Contact
item.description: For a quote, inquiry, or to schedule an on-site consult for custom sneeze guard installations CONTACT US TODAY! Like and follow us on Social media @Dora_Designs_and_Signs

item.title: About
item.description: Dora Designs is located in beautiful Mount Dora, Fl. just outside of Orlando. We currently operate in a climate controlled 800sq.ft. space with room to grow! We service all of Central Florida, including: Sanford, Lake Mary, Apopka, Oviedo, Winter Park, Maitland, Altamonte, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Clermont, Minneola, Leesburg, Tavares, and The Villages. Capabilities/equipment Our current equipment includes: 4’x8’ 3-axis CNC router (3hp ER20 spindle, air blast & coolant mist, external dust collection) 4’x3’ 2.

item.title: Custom Sneeze Guards
item.description: Is your medical office or reception area looking to protect their employees and comply with suggested CDC guidelines during the COVID-19 pandemic? Do you want a simple, aesthetically pleasing, crystal clear barrier with a clean look that matches your professional office? We can come to you to assess the area, measure, and discuss options. We develop a 3D rendering for your review and approval. Then we manufacture, deliver and install, with face masks and white gloves on for cleanliness.

item.title: Product Design
item.description: We design! from your idea, napkin sketch, broken parts, legacy blueprints or CAD files. We can modify your designs to lower manufacturing costs. Have an idea? Give us a call We can provide the detailed drawings manufacturers require to make parts.
